Put a card of a certain type from your draw pile in your hand. If your draw pile contains no card of that type, put a random card of that type from your discard pile to your hand.
Drain damage grants #yTemporary #yHP equal to half the unblocked damage dealt.
Changes the damage type of your next hit. #yVigor counts as an #yInfusion.
Venom damage inflicts #yVenom equal to unblocked damage dealt. When hit, creatures with #yVenom lose HP equal to unblocked damage, up to their amount of #yVenom, and lose that much #yVenom.
When hit, creatures with #yVenom lose HP equal to unblocked damage, up to their amount of #yVenom, and lose that much #yVenom.
